You have entered invalid information. Carefully review your information and please try again.

As a Sam\'s Club Discover Cardmember, you cannot register for the Account Center access at Discovercard.com. To manage your account you may register at the Sam\'s Club Web Site. Please contact customer service at 1–866–221–1126 for more information.
(This is a 16– digit number starting with 6011. Do not include space or hyphens.)
(Must be 6–16 characters and must not look like an account number. User ID can contain most special characters except for: (\"), (\'), (\\) and spaces)
(Must be 8–32 characters and have at least one letter and one number. Your password is case sensitivie and can also use all special characters.)
(Used to confirm receipt of your online account registration.)
User ID and password must not be the same.
User ID is already in use. Please choose another one.
